data.description:
Pigasus is a feature rich universal media player that supports networked streaming of media from UPNP/DLNA media servers and Samba shares as well as local playback. The Lite version is a scaled down version with some non essential features disabled. 

Pigasus Lite is for those that just want to be able to stream video from their UPNP/DLNA capable media server or browse content on their phone without all the bells and whistles. Or those that are curious about Pigasus VR Media Player and wish to try it before investing in the full version.

Access, setup and enjoy your media the way you want it. Pigasus supports a host of features optimized for a comfortable VR viewing experience.

Please see the Pigasus FAQ for additional feature support, information and help:

https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq

changelog.change_log: - Fix video playback issue on  Exynos chipset phones running Android 9 Pie

- Updated to latest Oculus Mobile SDK to try to fix Android 9 Pie display issues 
- Added playback speed controls 
- Added German language support

#Update 2 
- Fix reorientation issue caused by deprecated function call in new Oculus SDK update.

- Updated to latest Oculus Mobile SDK to try to fix Android 9 Pie display issues
- Added playback speed controls
- Added German language support

New Features 
=============
 - Add recognition of webm files. 
 - Added Korean language support for app menus. 
 - Added 3rd file sorting option, "system". This allows the system to decide on sorting criteria. 
   This should allow your DLNA media server to decide how each shared folder is sorted. 
   
Bug Fixes 
========== 
- Fix video start up bug when playing back some videos over DLNA. 

Please see Pigasus FAQ for more details on new features: https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq

*** 2.07 Update 2 ***
Try to fix playback issues from 2.07 update reported from users using Exynos chipset phones

New Features
=============
- Add recognition of webm files.
- Added Korean language support for app menus.
- Added 3rd file sorting option, "system". This allows the system to decide on sorting criteria. 
  This should allow your DLNA media server to decide how each shared folder is sorted.

Bug Fixes
==========
- Fix video start up bug when playing back some videos over DLNA.

New Features
=============
- Added functionality to switch languages for app menu text. Currently only English, Chinese and Japanese languages supported. Others to be added in the future.
- Added functionality to adjust maximum Cinema Theater brightness/darkness during media playback
- Tie head orientation reset to controller reset with long hold of home button on the controller.
- Enabled all Screen Settings options! (i.e. brightness, contrast as well as saturation)

Bug Fixes
==========
- Fix bug where controller "hold trigger gesture to jump to next media" was sometimes jumping 2 media items at a time.
- Fix numeric display bug for screen settings menu items

- Updated to use latest mobile sdk
- App running on Oculus Go will now run in 72hz mode
- Enabling full menu support for subtitle and audio tracks in player controls
- Split settings menu up into 3 categories to better find various settings:
   + "General"
   + "Screen"
   + "Subtitle"
- Added file sorting option (in general settings)
- Added screen saturation option (in screen settings)
- Added a bunch of new subtitle settings options:
   + ability to choose file text encoding (should help with some non-western subtitles)
   + ability to adjust subtitle time delay
   + option to turn on/off support of 2d subtitles for 3d videos (disabled as it makes no sense to enable this option for Lite)
- Some other minor bug fixes

minor stability update to try to preempt possible stability issue on Android 8 phones

- improve app resolution
- added rotate functionality for videos
- small miscellaneous updates to try to catch/predict potential stability issues.

New Features and Improvements
=============================
- Update to Oculus 1.12 Mobile SDK

======================= 
- Be more selective on the type of upnp services we want discovered so as to hopefully prevent rare crash caused by some smart devices using rogue upnp service on network

Moving Pigasus away from being a dedicated UPNP/DLNA media player to a universal media player with local playback support. 

New features: 
- Support local browsing and playback of media on phone 
- Optimised icon loading with better memory management for a smoother browsing experience 
- Changed media selection menu to use large icons 
- Added shortened text that auto scrolls when hovered over 
- Changed Theater Selection to larger icons 
- Added a new "Settings" menu with following options 
  + IPD adjustment (Disabled in Lite) 
  + bluetooth audio offset adjustment 
  + screen brigthness adjustment (Disabled in Lite) 
  + screen contrast adjustment (Disabled in Lite) 
- App now auto detects and adjusts for audio lag (controlled via 'Settings' menu) when bluetooth headset is enabled 
- App now plays a short intro video at app start. 

-- v2.0.01 minor update --
- Add option to swith from new icon view to "old" list view and vice versa for media selection menu

Please see the Pigasus FAQ for additional information and help: 
http://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq

Minor update:
- Fix bug that was causing app to only display a max of 999 items

- Making "Shuffle" and "Play All" functions available for all media types in media player menu (previously only available if playing audio media in full version).
- Consolidated "Loop", "Shuffle" and "Play All" functions into a "Playback Settings" sub-menu in the media player menu.
- Small redesign of media player menu to make a little more room for planned new menu items for new future functionality.
- Stability update to fix rare crash during device discovery when we manually rescan for devices.
Minor update to keep menu gui in Lite version of app  in sync with full version's menu gui

* Update Cinema Theater model:
  - increased Theater resolution
  - made cinema 50% larger

* Make default Void Theater screen larger

* Remember various app settings between subsequent app launchs:
  - last Theater mode we were in
  - Void Theater screen zoom preference

* Remember last place we stopped video between subequent app launchs

* Added double tap to "play video from start" feature when selecting video in media selection menu to offset new "resume from last place we stopped" feature.

Double tap to "play video from start" feature also added to supporting gamepad controllers and the new Gear VR controller. For more details, please see: 

http://hanginghatstudios/pigasus/#controls

* Added functionality to jump forward or backwards by 30 seconds via touchpad swiping
* Added ability to move to next/previous media via touchpad swiping instead of going through the player menu
* Updated gamepad controller support to support advance to next/previous media feature and new jump +/- 30 second feature.
* Added support for new Gear VR Controller

For more details on supported controls for headset trackpad, gamepad controllers and the new Gear VR controller, please see: 

http://hanginghatstudios/pigasus/#controls
